name: TXT
description: TXT (Tomorrow X Together) is HYBE's second boy group known for their creative concepts, youth-focused themes, and synchronized performances.

funFacts: First TXT member revealed, instantly went viral
Known for his exceptional dancing and fashion
His blue hair era is legendary among fans
Best friends with Stray Kids' Hyunjin and ENHYPEN's Sunoo
Lived in USA for 2 years during childhood
members.bio: Yeonjun is TXT's '4th Gen It Boy,' known for his exceptional dance skills and trendsetting fashion. He was the first member revealed and instantly captured attention. His charismatic performances and friendly personality have made him iconic.

funFacts: One of the tallest K-Pop idols at 185cm
Known for his dimples and bunny-like smile
Hosted Music Bank with IVE's Arin
Very introverted but opens up to MOA
Has a calming, gentle leadership style
members.bio: Soobin is TXT's gentle giant leader at 185cm tall. His dimples, bunny smile, and calm personality make him beloved. Despite being introverted, he's an excellent host (Music Bank) and caring leader who puts members first.

funFacts: Plays guitar and is very musically talented
Known for his teddy bear-like visuals
Has a '4D' quirky, playful personality
Was a band kid before becoming a trainee
His laugh is contagious and unique
members.bio: Beomgyu is TXT's teddy bear with a '4D' personality. His guitar skills, quirky humor, and bear-like visuals make him unique. He brings playful energy to TXT and is known for his contagious laughter.

funFacts: Known for his powerful, stable vocals
Very logical and intelligent - always speaks his mind
Works out regularly and is very fit
Best friends with ENHYPEN's Sunoo
Can harmonize with any song immediately
members.bio: Taehyun is TXT's main vocalist with a powerful voice that stands out in 4th gen. He's known for his logical thinking, fitness dedication, and straightforward personality. His vocal stability during performances is remarkable.

funFacts: Half Korean, half German-American
Has a famous sister (Lea of VCHA)
Collects plushies - has hundreds
Known for his unique vocals and high notes
Very playful maknae who loves pranks
members.bio: Huening Kai is TXT's maknae with a unique multicultural background (Korean-German-American). His distinctive vocals, plushie collection, and playful personality make him special. He's known for his high notes and penguin-like cuteness.

seo.title: TXT Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with MOA
seo.description: Create your TXT name with Yeonjun, Soobin, Beomgyu, Taehyun & Huening Kai! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for MOA.
